00008 W.control('FGraph');

00010 
00011 <script type='text/javascript'>
00012 var g = new W.FGraph();
00013 
00014 var node1 = g.addNode( null, 2, true, 40, '#eeee66', '1px solid #bebe36');
00015 var node2 = g.addNode( null, 2, true, 40, '#eeee66', '1px solid #bebe36');
00016 var node3 = g.addNode( null, 2, true, 40, '#eeee66', '1px solid #bebe36');
00017 var node4 = g.addNode( null, 2, true, 40, '#eeee66', '1px solid #bebe36');
00018 var node5 = g.addNode( null, 2, false, 96, '#6688ee', '1px solid #3658be');
00019 var node6 = g.addNode( null, 2, false, 96, '#6688ee', '1px solid #3658be');
00020 var node7 = g.addNode( null, 2, false, 96, '#6688ee', '1px solid #3658be');
00021 var node8 = g.addNode( null, 2, false, 96, '#6688ee', '1px solid #3658be');
00022 var node9 = g.addNode( null, 2, false, 96, '#6688ee', '1px solid #3658be');
00023 var node10 = g.addNode( null, 2, false, 96, '#6688ee', '1px solid #3658be');
00024                 
00025 g.addEdge( node1, node5, 30 );
00026 g.addEdge( node1, node6, 30 );
00027 g.addEdge( node2, node7, 30 );
00028 g.addEdge( node2, node8, 30 );
00029 g.addEdge( node3, node9, 30 );
00030 g.addEdge( node4, node10, 30 );
00031 
00032 g.setOrigin('core');
00033 </script>
